TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MessageBodyMemberAttribute extends System.ServiceModel.MessageContractMemberAttribute

summary.span: 指定成員序列化成為 SOAP 本文內的項目。

span.span: Specifies that a member is serialized as an element inside the SOAP body.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 屬性指定資料成員序列化進入 SOAP 本文內以及控制一些序列化項目。Use the attribute to specify that a data member is serialized into the SOAP body and to control some serialization items. 屬性用來指定若預設字母順序不適當時，本文部分的順序。The property is used to specify the order of body parts in cases where the default alphabetical order is not appropriate. 其他屬性繼承自基底類別，。The other properties are inherited from the base class, . 如需有關如何控制 SOAP 本文內容的序列化，而不需修改預設 SOAP 封套本身的詳細資訊，請參閱 < ， [Specifying Data Transfer in Service Contracts](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/specifying-data-transfer-in-service-contracts.md)，和[使用資料合約](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-data-contracts.md)。For more information about controlling the serialization of the contents of a SOAP body without modifying the default SOAP envelope itself, see , [Specifying Data Transfer in Service Contracts](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/specifying-data-transfer-in-service-contracts.md), and [Using Data Contracts](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-data-contracts.md). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Using Message Contracts](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-message-contracts.md)。For more information, see [Using Message Contracts](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-message-contracts.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 控制要求訊息和回應訊息的 SOAP 封套結構，並說明如何使用 建立回應訊息的 SOAP 標頭和使用 指定要求訊息和回應訊息的本文。The following code example shows the use of the to control the SOAP envelope structure for both the request message and the response message, and the use of both the (to create a SOAP header for the response message) and the (to specify the bodies of both the request and response message). 這個程式碼範例包含每個所傳送訊息的範例。The code example contains an example of each message when sent. [!code-csharp[MessageHeaderAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/messageheaderattribute/cs/services.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageHeaderAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/messageheaderattribute/vb/services.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需完整的範例，請參閱 。See for a complete example.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Order { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Order : int with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指出成員序列化至 SOAP 本文的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the position in which the member is serialized into the SOAP body.

value.span: SOAP 本文中項目的位置。

span.span: The location of the element in the SOAP body.

exception.span: 傳給屬性 setter 的值會是負整數。

span.span: The value passed to the property setter is a negative integer.
